__TOC__

=== Current Issues (Ubuntu 9.04 Jaunty Jackalope) ===
 

=== Issues (Ubuntu 8.04 LTS Hardy Heron) ===
* ATI cards, wrong configuration (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/bugs/180343|# 180343]]</nowiki>) (in release 4, no clear if in release still happens, i've been updating with no error)
* This is actually a bug(<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/258025|# 258025]]</nowiki>) specific for this hardware (I think): the ATI card is not correctly initialised. I got it working using these: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RadeonDriver|HOWTO: install Radeon driver]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=310018|HOWTO: activate 3D Acceleration]]</nowiki>

=== Issues (Feisty Fawn) ===

* Some hotkeys don't work (<nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=13983|#13983]]</nowiki>)
* Sleep does not work - it sleeps ok but does not come back up (<nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=13978|#13978]]</nowiki>)
